name: Tydy
description:
The relationship between employee and employer is changing.
 With Tydy's Employee Data Platform, People Teams can manage and route data and documents, orchestrate data across HR, IT, and Vendor apps, segment & target employees with persona-based journeys, and deliver a better employee experience - from onboarding to offboarding.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: One place for Employee Experience, New Hire Onboarding
ShortDescription: Tydy consolidate and clean employee data to seamlessly connect every workplace interface.

Highlights.name: Data and document capture
Highlights.description: Easily capture all the data you need, in the format you need it in.

Highlights.name: Put your people data to work
Highlights.description: Reduce your operational overheads by doing more with less. Built-in and customizable automation for onboarding, compliance, vendor management, HR-IT sync, etc. will save you time and resources.

Highlights.name: Scale and personalize, seamlessly
Highlights.description: Move faster with standardized processes across teams, business units and locations. But keep the personal touch with persona-based segmentation and targeting.

Highlights.name: One-app experience
Highlights.description: Give your people all the information they need in one place. Whether it’s your employee handbook, company policy, training modules, get your people productive faster.

Highlights.name: Onboarding journeys
Highlights.description: Create one-and-done journeys for new hires. Get your onboarding checklist done, and more.

enhanced_description: Tydy is an Employee Data Platform designed for People Teams to manage, route, and orchestrate employee data and documents across HR, IT, and vendor applications. It consolidates and cleans employee data to seamlessly connect various workplace interfaces, delivering a comprehensive employee experience from onboarding to offboarding. The platform facilitates data and document capture, automates processes like onboarding, compliance, and vendor management, and enables persona-based segmentation and targeting for personalized employee journeys. It offers a 'one-app experience' for employees to access essential information like handbooks, policies, and training modules, significantly streamlining new hire onboarding processes and reducing operational overheads.
